channel.title: Suggestion: generate new bridge lines automatically in tor-control-panel
channel.description:
Hi. Tor is blocked in my area so I need to use bridges. Bridge nodes are very unstable so they can suddenly turn off. Generally, there are two ways to configure bridge lines:
1. obfs4 (recommended) - this option automatically adds generated obfs4 bridge lines to torrc file and then starts bootstrapping process 2. Manually add bridge lines - very inconvenient. Need to visit Tor Project site every time and solve captcha in order to get new bridge lines.
But the problem is when I select `obfs4 (recommended)` in `Configure` menu in `tor-control-panel`, bridge lines are often remain the same. I'd like to always have a newly generated bridge lines every time I press `obfs4 (recommended)`. Is it possible to implement this?
